pr_title: async/bounce cache invalidation and websocket events

timeline.bodyText: Imho we shouldn't drop this method alltogether..if we have getXXXValue() methods for a certain type, i think we should have them for all ConfigurationLevels
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText:
basically, the user shall never use MSysConfig. They shall use ISysConfigBL/ISysConfigDAO.
I started to clean it up to see how many dependencies we still have.
replies.author: teosarca

timeline.author: metas-ts
